name: Freeflight (itch)
description:
Please note: This game is currently in development and is not yet complete.  

Check out our Twitter and Devlog for updates on Freeflight's progress!

Welcome to Lunation Empire Industries, Worker 20055781! 

Thank you for choosing to join us, the largest prospecting and resources company in the multiverse. We are proud to have you as a valued member of the Lunation family.

 Your first task is simple: 

- Glide, dive and soar your way across a dreamlike planet to collect its valuable resources, using your environment to aid your traversal.

 - Explore a fully realised cockpit, where we have provided you with the tools to upgrade your glider.

- Ignore the signals that your ship is receiving. They are of no interest to you.

It's lonely out there, in the dark...
